mng: to rise, to raise, to get up, to set out, to start, to appear, to launch, to initiate (action), to draft, to establish, to get (from a depot or counter), verb suffix, to start, (before place or time) starting from, classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance, classifier for groups: batch, group

exm.mng: in the same place, together, with, altogether (in total)
to stand up, to get up

(after a verb) indicating the beginning and continuation of an action or a state, indicating an upward movement (e.g. after 站[zhan4]), bringing things together (e.g. after 收拾[shou1 shi5]), (after a perception verb, e.g. 看[kan4]) expressing preliminary judgement
to give rise to, to lead to, to cause, to arouse
seemingly, apparently, looks as if, appear to be, gives the impression that, seems on the face of it to be
cause, a factor (leading to an effect)
to appear suddenly, projection, bit sticking out
to promote, to reinstate (in a position or job)
